ID-1.name: ID-1
ID-1.comment: Used for Credit/Debit cards, drivers licenses, id cards etc

ID-3.name: ID-3
ID-3.comment: Used for passport booklets - we have a 90 degree turned dimension for booklets, because in iPhone the rectangle shown in camera view when capturing Passport is turned by 90 degrees

Letter.name: Letter
Letter.comment: US Letter Size paper. Closest ISO size for this is A4
